attributes.action: Removal of cycle path on Exmouth Sea Front
attributes.additional_details: The pavement along Exmouth Seafront is to narrow to safely have a dedicated cyclepath, in places it is barely wide enough for a single person to walk without being struck by cyclists. This is an area where parents should be able to walk wit their children without worrying about speeding cyclists on the pavement. Please move the cycle path to the road and give the area back to pedestrians.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
